notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. The link might be incorrect or the page may have been removed.

hero.subtitle: TurnoLink is the all-in-one platform that enables professionals to manage bookings, sync calendars, and keep clients automatically informed.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your schedule
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed for professionals who want to focus on what they do best.

calendar.title: Smart calendar
calendar.description: Manage your availability with a visual and intuitive calendar. Sync with Google Calendar and Outlook.

notifications.title: Automatic notifications
notifications.description: Send reminders via email and WhatsApp to your clients. Reduce no-shows by up to 70%.

clients.title: Client management
clients.description: Keep a complete history of each client, their preferences, and previous bookings.

analytics.title: Detailed analytics
analytics.description: Analyze your performance with clear metrics: revenue, occupancy, and booking trends.

multilingual.title: Multi-language
multilingual.description: Offer your booking page in multiple languages to reach more clients.

mobile.title: Mobile optimized
mobile.description: Manage your schedule from any device. Your clients can book easily.

security.title: Guaranteed security
security.description: Your data and your clients' data are protected with bank-level encryption.

fast.title: Instant bookings
fast.description: Your clients can book in seconds, 24/7, without calls or messages.

pricing.title: Plans that fit your business
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale when you need to. No commitments, cancel anytime.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of professionals already trust TurnoLink to manage their bookings.

1.quote: TurnoLink has saved me hours every week. I no longer have to answer calls to schedule appointments.
1.name: Maria Garcia

2.quote: My clients love being able to book anytime. The automatic notifications are great.
2.name: Carlos Rodriguez

3.quote: The sync with my personal calendar is perfect. Never double bookings again.
3.name: Ana Martinez

4.quote: Since using TurnoLink, client no-shows have dropped dramatically.
4.name: Pedro Lopez

5.quote: Simple and intuitive interface. In 5 minutes I had my booking page running.
5.name: Laura Sanchez

6.quote: Support is exceptional and the features cover all my needs.
6.name: Diego Torres

cta.title: Ready to transform your appointment management?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who already optimize their time with TurnoLink. Setup in minutes, no credit card required.
cta.trustText: ✓ No credit card required · ✓ Setup in 2 minutes · ✓ Cancel anytime

footer.description: The booking management platform that simplifies your schedule and improves your clients' experience.
